name: Responsive Portofolio
goals: Practicing **HTML** and **CSS** and using the Bootstrap framework to obtain a grid layout.
Getting acquainted with **build tools** to automatically process the images.

name: Interactive Resume
goals: Practicing **dom manipulations** in javascript and jQuery to make the resume interactive.
Using the **Google Maps API** to display a map dynamically updated by the users actions.
Using **d3.js** and the **canvas API** to draw a data-driven graph.

courses.title: How to Use Git and GitHub

name: Arcade Game
goals: Understanding the logic and architecture of a **game engine** in Javascript.
Coding the player and enemy classes in JavaScript's **object-oriented** pseudo-classical style.

name: Website Optimisation
goals: Lightening the **critical rendering path** of index.html to achieve a PageSpeed score of 94/100 on mobile.
Obtaining consistent **60 fps** when scrolling by avoiding layout trashing and unnecessary elements in javascript, and using 3D transforms in css.

name: Rwanda Map
goals: Creating a **single-page** map displaying a set of locations and making it possible to filter or add locations.
Making **asynchronous queries** to Wikipedia to get additional informations about each location.
Structure the application using **Knockout**'s implementation of the **MVC pattern**.

name: Feed Reader Testing
goals: Writing test suites with Jasmine.js to learn the basics of **testing**.
